sentences.en: A common saying goes, " Knit the brows and you will hit upon a stratagem. " In other words, much thinking yields wisdom.
sentences.cn: 俗话说: “ 眉头一皱,计上心来 ”. 就是说多想出智慧.

sentences.en: Finally, forward fixed necessary measures and controlling emphasis of stratagem.
sentences.cn: 最后, 提出了相应的战略配套措施及战略控制重点.

sentences.en: Fire, but because carrier's actual error or the private stratagem cause exception.
sentences.cn: 火灾, 但由于承运人的实际过失或私谋所引起的除外.

sentences.en: For accelerating the economic sustainable development of energy stratagem, offered important foundation.
sentences.cn: 为促进能源经济可持续发展, 提供了重要的理论依据.

sentences.en: I doubt that Dinitz took the stratagem too seriously.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑迪尼茨会认真对待这个做法.

sentences.en: I was merely a pawn in his cunning stratagem.
sentences.cn: 我只不过是他那狡猾计谋中的一件工具.

sentences.en: It is the favourite stratagem of our passions.
sentences.cn: 这就是咱们的热情的拿手好戏.

sentences.en: It was a stratagem cadres sometimes used to buy things for themselves.
sentences.cn: 很明显,这是干部们为了中饱私囊使出的伎俩.

sentences.en: Knit the brows and a stratagem comes to mind.
Knit your brows and you will hit upon a stratagem.
The adjustment of economy structure is important stratagem to national economy development.
sentences.cn: 经济结构调整是我国经济发展的重大战略.

sentences.en: The exchange reminded her of the stratagem she had thought of yesterday.
sentences.cn: 这一交谈使她想起了她昨天所考虑的计谋.

sentences.en: They used every stratagem to acquire the company.
sentences.cn: 他们想方设法占有这家公司.

sentences.en: Trade discounts may be used as a competitive stratagem to secure customer loyalty.
sentences.cn: 商业折扣可以用作维护顾客忠诚度的一种竞争策略。

sentences.en: Water resources management, watershed planning and water resources sustainable utilization stratagem study.
sentences.cn: 水资源规划 、 流域规划以及水资源可持续利用战略研究.

trans.tran_en: a trick or plan to deceive an enemy or gain an advantage
